items.body: As a branding agency we ever get the request from clients to develop something custom, since 2 years we work with NewCode as a sounding board and for development. Great flexibility, strong thinking and optimal code!
items.name: Lennert Gysen

items.body: Great customer service. Friendly and always reachable in case of any problem. Never been unreachable. Project from start to finish always been in touch with updates and very creative ideas. Great to work with.
items.name: Faruk Altin
